headline: UBS Lifts PepsiCo (PEP) Target After Solid Q4 Execution
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is included among the 15 Best Wide Moat Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On February 4, UBS analyst Peter Grom raised his price recommendation on PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) to $190 from $170. The analyst also reiterated a Buy rating on the stock. The call followed a solid fourth quarter, helped by better […]

headline: Pizza Hut closing 250 US stores as parent company considers selling the brand
summary: Pizza Hut plans to close 250 U.S. restaurants in the first half of this year as its parent company considers a sale of the chain.  Yum Brands said Wednesday it’s targeting underperforming Pizza Hut restaurants in its system.  Pizza Hut has more than 6,000 locations in the U.S.

headline: IBM Adds PepsiCo CEO To Board As AI And Valuation Story Evolves
summary: International Business Machines (NYSE:IBM) has elected PepsiCo chairman and CEO Ramon L. Laguarta to its board. The appointment brings a global consumer executive with deep digital and cultural transformation experience into IBM's top governance layer. This move reflects IBM's focus on AI, hybrid cloud, and broader digital modernization across its enterprise client base. NYSE:IBM recently closed at $289.05, with the share price reflecting a 12.6% return over the past year and a very large...

headline: BofA Lifts PT on PepsiCo (PEP) to $173 From $164
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is one of the best confectionery, cookie, and snack stocks to buy. On February 4, BofA lifted the price target on PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) to $173 from $164 while maintaining a Neutral rating on the shares. The rating update followed PepsiCo, Inc.’s (NASDAQ:PEP) release of its fiscal Q4 and full-year 2025 financial results […]

headline: Celsius And PepsiCo Tie Distribution Closer As Alani Nu Joins Network
summary: Celsius Holdings (NasdaqCM:CELH) is expanding its partnership with PepsiCo, which now includes a larger role as U.S. Strategic Energy Drink Captain. The collaboration also brings Alani Nu into PepsiCo’s distribution network, aligning it alongside Celsius within the broader energy drink portfolio. This development is positioned to reshape how Celsius products reach retailers and consumers in the U.S. energy drink market. Celsius Holdings focuses on fitness oriented energy drinks, a segment...
